name: calc_wells_dvt
description: Wells' Criteria for deep vein thrombosis (DVT) is a tool to estimate the probability of the presence of DVT. For more information, see https://openmedcalc.org/wells-dvt

active_cancer.title: Active cancer
active_cancer.description: Does the patient have active cancer (treatment or palliation within 6 months)?

bedridden_recently.title: Bedridden recently
bedridden_recently.description: Has the patient been bedridden recently (greater than 3 days) or had major surgery within 12 weeks?

calf_swelling.title: Calf swelling
calf_swelling.description: Does the patient have calf swelling greater than 3 cm compared to the other leg? (measured 10 cm below tibial tuberosity)

collateral_veins.title: Collateral veins
collateral_veins.description: Does the patient have collateral (nonvaricose) superficial veins?

entire_leg_swollen.title: Entire leg swollen
entire_leg_swollen.description: Does that patient have an entire leg which is swollen?

localized_tenderness.title: Localized tenderness
localized_tenderness.description: Does the patient have localized tenderness along a deep venous system?

pitting_edema.title: Pitting edema
pitting_edema.description: Does the patient have pitting edema, confined to symptomatic leg?

paralysis_paresis_or_plaster.title: Paralysis, paresis, or plaster immobilization
paralysis_paresis_or_plaster.description: Does the patient have paralysis, paresis, or recent plaster immobilization of the lower extremity?

previous_dvt.title: Previously documented DVT
previous_dvt.description: Does the patient have previously-documented DVT?

alternative_diagnosis_as_likely.title: Alternative diagnosis to DVT
alternative_diagnosis_as_likely.description: Does the patient have alternative diagnosis to DVT as likely or more likely?
